title: LF Partner to Create Team:
body:
IGN: YorSick

Need someone who sees the game similar to me and has a great understanding and most champs. I hope is that we can create a solid team that will compete on competeleague.com

replies.body: I can go any role except for support but I pref to be top or jg. I understand all champions (even if I can't play them, I know their strong side and weak side), except for kled and the new yorick. Hope I can be on your team. I'm gold 5
hey i can play top, jg, or mid and im silver 4 if your making a team I hope i can join
Hello, I main ADC and can play most, if not all well. I main Vayne and i'm Silver 3. Lets get a team together
